ORIGAM Documentation : Login & Signout using Ajax

Created by V치clav Urb치nek, last modified by Tom치코 Vavrda on Mar 16, 2015

AjaxLogin

Authenticates a user using username and password provided in the query string. Authentication cookie is set as a result.

Parameters

usernameUsername to check.
passwordPassword to check.

Returns

JSON string with the following values:

Statusint

Status code.

  • 200 = OK
  • 204 = Username and password doesn't match
  • 500 = Fails
MessagestringStatus clarification.

Example Request

#TODO_FILE:7929888#

AjaxSignOut

Sign out current user - resets an authentication cookie and releases user-related data from the server.

RETURNS

JSON string with the following values:

Statusint

Status code.

  • 200 = OK
  • 500 = Fails
MessagestringStatus clarification.

Configuration

In order to enable AjaxLogin to all users you need to add the following part into your web.config file:

web.config
    <location path="AjaxLogin">
        <system.web>
            <authorization>
                <allow users="*" />
            </authorization>
        </system.web>
    </location>
